Run any of the numbered .py files containing examples. Note that some of them
might need lincensig options enabled on your account (such as historic requests).
If the account does not have the feature enabled the query will throw a Forbidden
exception, see the example 12_test_account_options.py.

For further information on available parameters, models etc. please visit
api.meteomatics.com

In case of questions just write a mail to:
support@meteomatics.com
